name: NSProgressIndicator
desc: An interface that provides visual feedback to the user about the status of an ongoing task.

items.name: func startAnimation(Any?)
items.desc: Starts the animation of an indeterminate progress indicator.

items.name: func stopAnimation(Any?)
items.desc: Stops the animation of an indeterminate progress indicator.

items.name: var usesThreadedAnimation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the progress indicator implements animation in a separate thread.

items.name: func increment(by: Double)
items.desc: Advances the progress bar of a determinate progress indicator by the specified amount.

items.name: var doubleValue: Double
items.desc: The value that indicates the current extent of the progress indicator.

items.name: var minValue: Double
items.desc: The minimum value for the progress indicator.

items.name: var maxValue: Double
items.desc: The maximum value for the progress indicator.

items.name: var controlSize: NSControl.ControlSize
items.desc: The size of the progress indicator.

items.name: var isBezeled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the progress indicator’s frame has a three-dimensional bezel.

items.name: var isIndeterminate: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the progress indicator is indeterminate.

items.name: var style: NSProgressIndicator.Style
items.desc: The style of the progress indicator (bar or spinning).

items.name: func sizeToFit()
items.desc: This action method resizes the progress indicator to an appropriate size depending on the value of style.

items.name: var isDisplayedWhenStopped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the progress indicator hides itself when it isn’t animating.

items.name: enum NSProgressIndicator.Style
items.desc: Specify the progress indicator’s style used by style.
